value.description: Enter the initial content of the box

password.description: Whether it is a password type

placeholder.description: A placeholder when the input box is empty

placeholderClass.description: 指定 placeholder 的样式类
placeholderClass.description_zh: 指定 placeholder 的样式类

placeholderTextColor.description: 指定 placeholder 的文本颜色
placeholderTextColor.description_zh: 指定 placeholder 的文本颜色

maxlength.description: The maximum input length is set to -1 without limiting the maximum length
maxlength.description_zh: 最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

cursorSpacing.description: Specifies the distance between the cursor and the keyboard, in px. Take the minimum value of the distance from the bottom of the input and the distance specified by cursor-spacing as the distance from the cursor to the keyboard
cursorSpacing.description_zh: 指定光标与键盘的距离，单位 px 。取 input 距离底部的距离和 cursor-spacing 指定的距离的最小值作为光标与键盘的距离

autoFocus.description: (Soon, please use focus directly) autofocus, pull up the keyboard is not recommended
autoFocus.description_zh: (即将废弃，请直接使用 focus )自动聚焦，拉起键盘不推荐使用

confirmType.description: Set the text of the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard to take effect only when type='text'
confirmType.description_zh: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字，仅在type='text'时生效

confirmHold.description: Whether to keep the keyboard unfolded when you click the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard
confirmHold.description_zh: 点击键盘右下角按钮时是否保持键盘不收起

cursor.description: Specify the cursor position when focusing

selectionStart.description: Cursor start position, effective when auto-gathering, needs to be used with selection-end
selectionStart.description_zh: 光标起始位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-end搭配使用

selectionEnd.description: The cursor end position is valid when auto-gathering, and needs to be used in conjunction with selection-start
selectionEnd.description_zh: 光标结束位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-start搭配使用

adjustPosition.description: When the keyboard pops up, whether the page is automatically pushed up
adjustPosition.description_zh: 键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

holdKeyboard.description: focus, and do not collapse the keyboard when clicking on the page
holdKeyboard.description_zh: focus 时，点击页面的时候不收起键盘

alwaysEmbed.description: Force input to be in the same layer state, and the input will switch to the non-same layer state when focusing by default (only takes effect under iOS)
alwaysEmbed.description_zh: 强制 input 处于同层状态，默认 focus 时 input 会切到非同层状态 (仅在 iOS 下生效)

safePasswordCertPath.description: The path of the public key encrypted by the security keyboard is only supported within the package
safePasswordCertPath.description_zh: 安全键盘加密公钥的路径，只支持包内路径

safePasswordLength.description: Enter the password length on the secure keypad
safePasswordLength.description_zh: 安全键盘输入密码长度

safePasswordSalt.description: The security keyboard calculates the hash salt value, which is invalid if custom-hash is specified
safePasswordSalt.description_zh: 安全键盘计算hash盐值，若指定custom-hash 则无效

safePasswordCustomHash.description: 安全键盘计算hash的算法表达式,如 MD5(SHA1('foo' + SHA256(sm3(password + 'bar'))))
safePasswordCustomHash.description_zh: 安全键盘计算hash的算法表达式，如 md5(sha1('foo' + sha256(sm3(password + 'bar'))))

randomNumber.description: When the type is number, digit, the idcard numeric keypad is randomly arranged
randomNumber.description_zh: 当 type 为 number, digit, idcard 数字键盘是否随机排列

controlled.description: Whether it is a controlled component. When true, the value content is fully controlled by setData. It is recommended not to set controlled to true when the type value is text, see Bugs & Tips for details
controlled.description_zh: 是否为受控组件。为 true 时，value 内容会完全受 setData 控制。建议当 type 值为 text 时不要将 controlled 设置为 true,详见 Bugs & Tips

nativeProps.description: Used to transparently transfer properties on WebComponents to internal H5 labels
nativeProps.description_zh: 用于透传 WebComponents 上的属性到内部 H5 标签上

name.description: The name of the component, which is used to obtain data for form submission.
name.description_zh: 组件名字，用于表单提交获取数据。

alwaysSystem.description: Whether to enforce the use of input elements created by the system keyboard and web-view. If true, confirm-type and confirm-hold may be invalid.
alwaysSystem.description_zh: 是否强制使用系统键盘和 Web-view 创建的 input 元素。为 true 时，confirm-type、confirm-hold 可能失效。

ariaLabel.description_zh: 无障碍访问，（属性）元素的额外描述

clueType.description: For distribution purposes. Valid values: 0 and 1, where 0 is the default and 1 is the mobile phone number, which needs to be used together with the retention distribution configuration.
clueType.description_zh: 用于分发目的。取值：0 和 1，其中 0 表示默认，1 表示手机号，需要和留资分发配置一起使用，详情见留资分发配置。

onInput.description: When the keyboard inputs, the input event is triggered, event.detail = {value, cursor, keyCode}, and the handler can directly return a string, which will replace the content of the input box.
onInput.description_zh: 当键盘输入时，触发input事件，event.detail = {value, cursor, keyCode}，处理函数可以直接 return 一个字符串，将替换输入框的内容。

onFocus.description: 输入框聚焦时触发，event.detail = { value, height }，height 为键盘高度
onFocus.description_zh: 输入框聚焦时触发，event.detail = { value, height }，height 为键盘高度

onBlur.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
onBlur.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

onConfirm.description: Triggered when the Done button is clicked

onKeyboardHeightChange.description: This event is triggered when the keyboard height changes
onKeyboardHeightChange.description_zh: 键盘高度发生变化的时候触发此事件

onNickNameReview.description: Triggered after the user's nickname is reviewed, it is only valid when the type is "nickname", event.detail = { pass, timeout }
onNickNameReview.description_zh: 用户昵称审核完毕后触发，仅在 type 为 "nickname" 时有效，event.detail = { pass, timeout }
